title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch Northrop Grumman Cygnus spacecraft to the International Space Station on Falcon 9 rocket
summary: The mission, dubbed NG-21, will be the second out of three planned launches of a Cygnus spacecraft onboard a Falcon 9 rocket. Liftoff is set for Saturday, Aug. 3, at 11:29 a.m. EDT (1529 UTC).

title: NASA retaining plans to select a single Artemis lunar rover
summary: NASA is not reconsidering plans to select only one company to develop an Artemis lunar rover, despite a setback in another program procuring key elements of the lunar exploration effort as a service.
